name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a dedicated DevSecOps Engineer with 8 years of Full Stack Development experience, I specialize in ensuring robust security and compliance throughout the software development lifecycle. My expertise includes implementing containerization and orchestration technologies such as **Docker**, **Harbor**, and **Bitnami**, as well as vulnerability management tools like **Trivy**, **Clair**, and **Grype** to safeguard enterprise applications.
I’ve successfully integrated security practices within CI/CD pipelines, ensuring adherence to compliance standards like CIS, HIPAA, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Leveraging my full stack experience with **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **React**, **Node.js**, and **Flutter**, I design secure applications that optimize performance and maintain scalability.
Additionally, my background in cloud services on **Azure** and **AWS** strengthens my ability to deploy secure applications within cloud environments, fostering a culture of security within Agile workflows. I am adept in developing AI/ML capabilities to enhance security measures, ensuring real-time analytics and proactive threat detection.
